revised_title: Comparative Morphology of the Leaf in Vascular Cryptogams and Gymnosperms
tldr: The author examines the comparative morphology of the leaf in vascular cryptogams and gymnosperms, proposing a consistent method of treatment for the leaf as a branch system. They analyze the development of leaves in various plant types, including Hymenophylla, Leptosporangiate Ferns, Osmundacece, Marattiacece, and Cycadacece, and discuss the progressive differentiation of the phyllopodium as a supporting organ.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
